Sequence Information.Peptide Name: GLRC-8 (Synthetic AMPs, variant of GLR-19, Arg-rich; Leu-rich; 1S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature.Author: Wang G, Watson KM, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Buckheit RW Jr. 2011
Literature.Reference: J AIDS Clinic Res S2:003. doi:10.4172/2155-6113.S2-003.Wang HIV screen project
Literature.Title:
De Novo Design of Antiviral and Antibacterial Peptides with 
Varying Loop Structures

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is poorly similar (80.95%) toGLRC-2. R: 37%; L: 37%.Chemical modification:  one disulfide bond C4-C16.Activity: inhibited E. coli (MIC 30 uM); B. subtilis (MIC 15-30 uM).Toxicity: TC50 31 ug/ml in CEM-SS cells.UPdated 6/2024
